issue.title: [C++] Appveyor toolchain build does not actually build the project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4487](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4487). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I haven't figured out what's going on yet, but it appears that the build is bailing out when calling `conda install` after activating the environment

https://ci.appveyor.com/project/ApacheSoftwareFoundation/arrow/builds/22145094/job/824x1h5wdakswq1t

comments.body:
